overview.title: MIMODZI Overview
overview.content: Welcome to Mimodzi, your innovative farming application, the ultimate digital partner for modern farmers. Harness the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for precision farming at your fingertips.

process_to_microfinance.item1: First download the MIMODZI app through Google Store and Apple Store.
process_to_microfinance.item2: MIMODZI is a platform where you can easily apply for agriculture loans.
process_to_microfinance.item3: Fill the application form and apply for the loan
process_to_microfinance.item4: AI could suggest the best loan options available based on the farmer's financial situation,

step.title: Apply For Loan
step.description: Here you can click on Apply for Loan and the next screen open in which you will fill the form

step.title: Fill the Loan Application Form
step.description: In this stage You will Provide you Personal information and you crop Information

step.title: AI Based Loan Suggestion
step.description: Here You can see the AI Based Loan Suggestion according to your best feasibility

step.title: Select Plan
step.description: In this Stage you can  Select the Loan Plan which is Suitable for you.

step.title: Wait For Approval
step.description: After that your application submit to our company and the company will contact you soon
